react.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It allows developers to create interactive web and native applications using reusable components, enabling efficient and scalable UI development.

threeJs.description: A lightweight, cross-browser, general-purpose 3D JavaScript library with WebGL and WebGPU renderers, also offering SVG and CSS3D addons.
threeJs.usage: 3D video wall previews and interactive configurator

gsap.description: GSAP is a framework-agnostic JavaScript animation library for building high-performance animations across all major browsers, animating anything from CSS and SVG to WebGL and React components.
gsap.usage: High-performance animations, transitions, and visual effects
